shortdesc.i: An array of field names (e.g. phoneNumbers, emails etc.) that should be used for filtering the contacts in the picker. (The names correspond to the field names in the blackberry.pim.contacts.Contact object.) A contact must have one or more of the attributes in this set in order to be displayed. If mode is ContactPickerOptions.MODE_MULTIPLE", this would determine the attributes to be shown in the picker. Fields must be specified in order for the picker to be invoked in ContactPickerOptions.MODE_MULTIPLE.
